abstract: General audio unit component selectors that correspond to functions in the audio unit API.

# General Audio Unit Function Selectors

**API Collection**

General audio unit component selectors that correspond to functions in the audio unit API.

## Constants

- **kAudioUnitAddPropertyListenerSelect**: Used by the system to register a property listener callback function for an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitAddPropertyListener(_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitAddRenderNotifySelect**
- **kAudioUnitComplexRenderSelect**
- **kAudioUnitGetParameterSelect**: Used by the system to get the current value of an audio unit parameter when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitGetParameter(_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitGetPropertyInfoSelect**: Used by the system to get property information from an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitGetPropertyInfo(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitGetPropertySelect**
- **kAudioUnitInitializeSelect**
- **kAudioUnitProcessMultipleSelect**
- **kAudioUnitProcessSelect**
- **kAudioUnitRange**
- **kAudioUnitRemovePropertyListenerSelect**: Used by the system to unregister a property listener callback function from an audio unit when you call the `AudioUnitRemovePropertyListener` function.
- **kAudioUnitRemovePropertyListenerWithUserDataSelect**
- **kAudioUnitRemoveRenderNotifySelect**
- **kAudioUnitRenderSelect**: Used by the system to invoke audio rendering by an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitRender(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitResetSelect**: Used by the system to reset an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitReset(_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitScheduleParametersSelect**: Used by the system to schedule an audio unit parameter value change when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitScheduleParameters(_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitSetParameterSelect**: Used by the system to set the value of an audio unit parameter when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitSetParameter(_:_:_:_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioUnitSetPropertySelect**
- **kAudioUnitUninitializeSelect**: Used by the system to uninitialize an audio unit when you call the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnitUninitialize(_:)] function.

## Enumerations

- **Audio Unit Types**: The defined types of audio processing plug-ins known as audio units.
- **Inter-App Audio Unit Types**
- **Audio Unit Manufacturer Identifier**: The Apple audio unit manufacturer code.
- **Audio Unit Output Subtypes**
- **I/O Audio Unit Subtypes**
- **Converter Audio Unit Subtypes**: Audio data format converter audio unit subtypes for audio units provided by Apple.
- **Reserved Audio Unit Clump Identifier**: Reserved for system use.
- **Offline Audio Unit Properties**: Properties for audio units that perform offline processing—that is, processing in a nonplayback, nonrealtime mode.
- **MIDI Audio Unit Parameters**: Parameters for instrument units.
- **Generator Audio Unit Subtypes**: Audio units that serve as sound sources.
- **Input/Output Audio Unit Subtypes**: Input/output audio unit subtypes for audio units provided by Apple.
- **Audio Unit Panner Subtypes**
- **Audio Unit Player Subtypes**
- **Audio Unit Pitch Subtypes**
- **AudioUnitEventType**
